description: This Dart source file defines an ApiClient class that manages HTTP communication using the Dio package. It provides both instance-based and singleton Dio clients, incorporating authentication interceptors and environment configurations.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class providing a configured Dio HTTP client, supporting instance-based usage and a singleton shared instance.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor that initializes an instance of ApiClient with a base URL and optional unauthorized callback.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Static getter for a singleton Dio instance, creating it if not already initialized.

methods.name: instance=
methods.description: Static setter to assign a Dio instance to the singleton.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the singleton Dio instance to null.
